notes
property.value:
Version 1.5.0

In the future an unknown enemy sets off a series of nuclear bombs on space above the U.S. provoking an electromagnetic pulse (E.M.P.) that shuts down nearly all electrical devices, bringing the economy to a halt.
The few operational military forces quickly move to the cities to maintain order but hostile military forces are soon detected on both Eastern and Western coasts while enemy armies mass on the Southern border.
Martial law is declared and militia forces called up to help defending the Northern Command. After sinking the remaining ships of the U.S. Navy, the forces of the Asian Alliance, the People's Liberation Front and the Euro Hegemony prepare for their next strikes...
The invasion of the USA has begun...

Gameplay
  • When game startes there will an initial deployment phase before turn 1 begins.
  • The US places first all its 60 units (24 regular, 12 mech, 9 arm, 9 heli and 6 bmr) + 12 lasers when the game starts. It has to place 2 units on all of the 30 US cities. The 12 lasers are then placed separately, maximum 1 for each city.
  • Starting with Western each invader then places 20 predefined units, on its attack zones: 8 regulars, 4 mechanized, 4 armor, 2 helicopters and 2 bombers. Each invasion zone has a unit placement limit of 5.
  • After all the invaders place their 20 units turn 1 will start. The order of play for each turn is: Western, Southern and Eastern, with the US playing last.
  • The turn sequence is: Buy Units (US only)/Place Units/Combat Move/Combat/Non Combat Move.

US Objectives
  • US player objective: control at least 13 cities and destroy all invaders.
  • Damage from the E.M.P limits the US' income to 12 PUs. The Americans will also receive 1 Infantry for every 16 territories they control.
  • The Americans may place 1 unit on any city, mountain or resource territories during the deployment phase, including enemy controlled territories (use Edit to liberate it before placing).
  • There are 97 US controlled territories at game start, allowing for a maximum production of 6 US Infantry units.
  • Americans cannot move into the starting invasion zones.
Invader(s) Objectives
  • Each invader has a total of 66 units: 24 regulars, 12 mech, 12 arm, 6 heli, 6 bombers and the 6 factories used to place units on the invasion zones.
  • Invader player(s) objective: conquer and hold at least 18 cities at the end of the US turn.
  • The invaders place 8 of their remaining units each turn until they are gone. After turn 6 there will be no reinforcements for the invaders.
  • The invaders are not allied and can attack and take territories from one another. However, they cannot move into the others' invasion zones.
Units (Attack/Defense/Movement/PU Cost):
  • Regular 1/1/1/3
  • Infantry 2/1/1/4 (US guerrilla units, 1 for each 15 US controlled territories)
  • Mechanized 1/2/2/4
  • Armor 2/2/2/5 (can blitz)
  • Helicopter 2/2/4/6 (can transport 1 infantry/regular as paratrooper)
  • Bomber 3/3/8/8
  • Laser 0/4/0/12 (2 hit, no repair - US only)

Author: Hobbes__
Images: Dagon81
Testing & Ideas: Pwnator
